# cloudflare_snippet_rules_list (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_snippet_rules_list" "example_snippet_rules_list" {
  zone_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
}
```
